channel.title: A math challange... Help!
channel.description:
this is not the simplist question in the world.. not like 1+1= one-on-a-bun or 2 the variables in this can ONLY be one digit and they are not added like normal the question is: [tt] THREE THREE FOUR [u] ONE[/u] ELEVEN[/tt]
so if a = 3 b = 7 c = 2 d = 6 e = 3 ab = 37 understand? and i have no given variables and it is due on tuesday monday night prefered please. so for example[tt] ab [u]+cd[/u] de[/tt]
again: there are no given variables and it has to = the order of the variables which look like a word(spelled correctly, but isn't ment to be a word) I hate my math teacher [br][size=1]Posted at: September 03, 2006, 06:58:59 AM[/size][hr]i know it seems like you could only get the answer at complete random but this is hard!

item.title: A math challange... Help!
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

i had to turn it in wrong…[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 05:36:04 PM[/size][hr]but… i bet i can make a program that can find it out… after a while…
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 05:36:36 PM[/size][hr]here is the program, if you don’t trust me get blitz basic demo and test this
.start1
t = Rnd(0,9)
h = Rnd(0,9)
r = Rnd(0,9)
e = Rnd(0,9)
f = Rnd(0,9)
o = Rnd(0,9)
u = Rnd(0,9)
r = Rnd(0,9)
n = Rnd(0,9)
l = Rnd(0,9)
v = Rnd(0,9)
;random variables
Print " "
Print “t=” + t
Print “h=” + h
Print “r=” + r
Print “e=” + e
Print “f=” + f
Print “o=” + o
Print “u=” + u
Print “r=” + r
Print “n=” + n
Print “l=” + l
Print “v=” + v
Print " "
;current stats
z = t10000 + h1000 + r100 + e10 + e
x = z + z
c = f1000 + o100 + u10 + r
b = o100 + n10 + e
;eleven
t = e100000 + l10000 + e1000 + v100 + e10 + n
;adding
p = x + c + b
If Not p = t Then
Goto start1
Else
Print “answer is:”
Print “t=” + t
Print “h=” + h
Print “r=” + r
Print “e=” + e
Print “f=” + f
Print “o=” + o
Print “u=” + u
Print “r=” + r
Print “n=” + n
Print “l=” + l
Print “v=” + v
WaitKey()
EndIf
End

Read full topic

item.title: A math challange... Help!
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

ill get as far as i can to help you, im leaving soon though, so w/e, whaty grade is this?

THREE
THREE
FOUR
ONE

ELEVEN

ok, so 2t+2h+2r+5e+f+2o+u+o+n=3e+l+v+n
meh, gotta go, be back in a few hours to finish

THREE
THREE
FOUR
ONE
ELEVEN

not the abc thing… and its not divide its addition, u suck at math.[/quote]

Wow dude, I didn’t know Ill remove my post and have YOU read the rules?

We don’t use “u” for “you”.
